form.title: CLIENT INTAKE

hero.description: Help us understand your business and creative vision. No wrong answers, the more honest you are, the stronger your brand will be.

form.draftBanner: You have a saved draft, your previous answers have been restored.

cta.note: Your answers are auto-saved in your browser so you can return and edit anytime. We'll review your submission and reach out within 2 business days.

q1.label: Describe your business in 2-3 sentences, as if explaining it to a stranger at dinner.
q1.hint: Avoid jargon. Focus on what you do, who you serve, and why it matters.
q1.placeholder: We help independent therapists build a practice that feels like them...

q2.label: What problem do you solve, and what does life look like for your customer after working with you?
q2.hint: Think transformation: the before and after.
q2.placeholder: Before: they struggle with... After: they feel...

q3.label: Paint a vivid picture of your ideal customer.
q3.hint: What do they care about, what do they want to be seen as, and what made them look for you specifically.
q3.placeholder: She runs a small creative business, values authenticity over trends, and wants her brand to feel as considered as her work...

q4.label: List 2-4 competitors or similar brands. What do they do well, and what does your audience find missing from them?
q4.hint: These don't need to be direct competitors. Any brand your audience might also consider.
q4.placeholder: Brand A is strong at X, but feels too cold. Our audience finds them lacking in...

q5.label: If your brand were a person, how would they walk into a room?
q5.hint: Presence, tone of voice, how they dress, how they make people feel. All personality, no product.
q5.placeholder: Confident but never arrogant. They speak slowly and deliberately...

q6.label: Complete this sentence: "We are the only _____ that _____.
q6.hint: Your positioning in one line. Rough is fine, just try.
q6.placeholder: We are the only accounting firm that speaks to creative freelancers without making them feel small.

q7.label: Who is the main action taker / decision maker for this project?

q8.label: Share 3-5 brands or visual references you admire, inside or outside your industry.
q8.hint: Logos, websites, packaging, editorial layouts, even spaces. Links or names both work.
q8.placeholder: Apple (clean, premium), Aesop (earthy, typographic), Dieter Rams (functional beauty)...

q9.label: Which color directions feel right for your brand? Select all that apply.

q10.label: Are there any colors that are completely off-limits?
q10.hint: Due to personal preference, industry association, or competitor use.
q10.placeholder: Please avoid purple, our main competitor uses it...

q11.label: Which aesthetic direction best describes how your brand should look and feel? Select up to two.
q11.hint: Think about texture, attitude, and energy. Focus on the overall feel, not just keywords.

q11Description.placeholder: Or describe your own aesthetic direction...

q12.label: Do you have existing brand assets that must carry into the new identity?
q12.hint: If starting fresh, write "none." If keeping elements, explain what and why.
q12.placeholder: We want to keep our current logo mark but redesign everything else...

q13.label: Which deliverables do you need from this project?
q13.hint: Select all that apply. We'll confirm the scope on our kickoff call.

q14.label: What is your budget approach for this project?

options.best: I want the best possible result no matter the cost

q15.label: Got any logos, photos, or moodboards that inspire your brand's direction? Drop them here. The more I see what moves you, the better I can design for you.
q15.hint: Up to 8 images. PNG, JPG, WEBP, or GIF.
q15.uploadLimit: Up to 8 images · PNG, JPG, WEBP, GIF

q16.label: Is there anything about your past branding experience, strong preferences, or fears we should know before we start?
q16.hint: The more openly you share, the better we can tailor this to you.
q16.placeholder: The last agency gave us something too generic. We really want this to feel like us...
